title: The Lion King
tip: Animated film about a royal cub.
fact: The original 1994 film became one of Disney’s most successful animated features.

title: Finding Nemo
tip: A clownfish searches for his son.
fact: The film won the 2004 Academy Award for Best Animated Feature.

title: Toy Story
tip: Toys come to life when humans leave.
fact: It was the first fully computer-animated feature film.

title: Inside Out
tip: Emotions run the mind of a young girl.
fact: Each emotion’s design is based on a specific shape: Joy is a star, Sadness is a teardrop, etc.

title: Moana
tip: A girl sets sail to save her island.
fact: The film was inspired by Polynesian mythology and navigation traditions.

title: Kung Fu Panda
tip: A clumsy panda trains to become a kung fu hero.
fact: Jack Black voices the main character, Po.

title: Zootropolis
tip: Animals live in a modern city run by mammals.
fact: The film’s UK title is 'Zootropolis', while it's called 'Zootopia' elsewhere.

title: Encanto
tip: A magical family lives in a living house.
fact: The film’s hit song 'We Don’t Talk About Bruno' topped charts worldwide.

title: Wall-E
tip: A lonely robot cleans up a deserted Earth.
fact: There’s very little spoken dialogue in the first half of the movie.

title: Ratatouille
tip: A rat becomes a chef in Paris.
fact: The film’s title is a pun: it’s both a dish and the main character’s species.
